src_original: yo jayeta sahasrāṇāṃ māse māse śataṃ śataṃ /
tgt_original: 雖復百歲中，　　山林祭火神，

src_original: māse māse kuśāgreṇa bālo bhuṃjeya bhojanaṃ /
tgt_original: 從月至於月，　　愚者用飲食，

src_original: na so buddhe prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṃ //
tgt_original: 彼人不信佛，　　十六不獲一。

src_original: na so dharme prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṃ //
tgt_original: 彼於四分中，　　亦不獲其一。

src_original: māse māse kuśāgreṇa bālo bhuṃjeya bhojanaṃ /
tgt_original: 從月至於月，　　愚者用飲食，

src_original: na so saṃghe prasādasya kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṃ //
tgt_original: 不生慈愍心，　　十六不及一。

src_original: māse māse kuśāgreṇa bālo bhūmjeya bhojanaṃ /
tgt_original: 從月至於月，　　愚者用飲食，

src_original: na so dhyānaprasādānāṃ kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṃ //
tgt_original: 彼不知法數，　　十六不及一。

src_original: māse māse kuśāgreṇa bālo bhuṃjeya bhojanaṃ /
tgt_original: 從月至於月，　　常行平等會，

src_original: na so sampannaśīlānāṃ kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṃ //
tgt_original: 彼人不信佛，　　十六不及一。

src_original: māse māse kuśāgreṇa bālo bhuṃjeya bhojanaṃ /
tgt_original: 從月至於月，　　常行平等會，

src_original: na so svākhyātadharmāṇāṃ kalām arghati ṣoḍaśīṃ //  yo ca varṣaśataṃ jīve agniparicaraṃ caret* /  patrāhāro chavāvāsī karonto vividhaṃ tapaṃ //
tgt_original: 彼人不信法，　　十六不及一。
